content: Mind Cores, like Blood of the Iron Bull, are one of the rarest Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong and it is vital that you find as many of them as possible to be able to provide passive upgrades to your stats, health, damage, and defense.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core'.
The content is as follows:
Mind Cores, like Blood of the Iron Bull, are one of the rarest Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong and it is vital that you find as many of them as possible to be able to provide passive upgrades to your stats, health, damage, and defense.
